imdb.title: Majikano
imdb.plot: Haruo Yoshikawa's life goes from average to unbelievable when he learns his family's secret - they're all witches!! Things get crazier with the arrival of Ayumi - an enchanting young girl who's bound and determined to arouse Haruo...

episodes.title: Kanojo ga majo tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: A young witch named Ayumi was cursed and the only one who can break the curse is a boy named Harou Yoshikawa. Problem is Harou has three magical sisters who go to great lengths to keep him form knowing that magic is real. Going so far as to erase any memories of having seen magic. Ayumi now has to find a way to bring out his hidden powers.

episodes.title: Seito kaichô mo majo tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: Ayumi's popularity is driving Yuri crazy. Tired of not being the center of attention, Yuri competes with Ayumi in a fashion battle. The contest heats up when Yuri reveals that she's a witch, too!

episodes.title: Kiken na kyôdai tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: Ayumi magically creates a land of dreams in Haruo's mind, hoping to help him become the kind of man she needs. Later, the sisters and Ayumi travel back in time to understand Maika's love for Haruo.

episodes.title: Nusumareta tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: Haruo's sisters are in the bath with Ayumi when a perverted weirdo breaks into the house and steals their panties! Making matters worse, he also steals something very important to Ayumi.

episodes.title: Uitti hantâ tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: A Witch Hunter - Marin - is hanging around and annoying Ayumi! When both girls make Haruo a lunch, a taste test ensues - and a magical mix-up causes them both to age in reverse!

episodes.title: Yûrei ga deta tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: The gang's going swimming, but Haruo doesn't know how. Ayumi takes it upon herself to teach him, but when it turns out the pool is haunted, the lessons will have to wait!

episodes.title: Meido ga kita tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: When a witch named Rika arrives to lend Ayumi a hand, a battle ensues to see which spell-binding young lady can best make ill Haruo feel better!

episodes.title: Shôri no kisu tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: Ayumi thinks she'll get a kiss from Haruo if she uses a magical book to make him the star of the Sports Festival. But when Yuri, Marin, and Maika get in the way, Haruo's kiss might go to another girl!

episodes.title: Nemureru ôji tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: The school's Cultural Festival will feature a play - Cinderella, with Yuri in the main role! The whole gang is taking part, but the production gets derailed when Ayumi's sister kidnaps Haruo!

episodes.title: Noroi no neko pantsu tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: Ayumi's wearing special panties meant to drive Haruo wild. Unfortunately, the panties are cursed - and Haruo's the only person who can get them off! Hopefully he can do it before the guys at school go nuts!

episodes.title: Sei naru yoru tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: It's the holidays and Haruo doesn't seem himself. Ayumi discovers it's because he's tired from working at a bakery. She suspects he's saving up to buy her a gift - until she sees him leave his job with another girl.

episodes.title: Mezame no koku tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: Haruo's powers seem to be stirring, so Ayumi's wants him to break her curse during a trip to a funhouse. Things get complicated when the funhouse turns out to be a trap set by Michiru!

episodes.title: Saishû kai tte maji desu ka
episodes.plot: Ayumi and the gang are powerless to stop Michiru, who has absorbed all of Haruo's powers. Luckily, Haruo - the Demon Lord - awakens and takes care of the situation himself!
